description: The supply, delivery, and offloading of miscellaneous groceries to the Edmonton Institute for Women (EIFW) and Bowden Institution, in Edmonton, Alberta for the period of the Standing Offer.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Miscellaneous Groceries
## Tender Title: Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISO) for the Supply, Delivery, and Offloading of Miscellaneous Groceries

### Tender Information
* Solicitation Number: WS4296804476
* Tender Reference Number: WS4296804476-Doc4319159189
* Publication Date: February 4, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: March 5, 2024, 2:00 PM MST
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

### Tender Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bids for Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISOs) for the supply, delivery, and offloading of Miscellaneous Groceries to the Edmonton Institute for Women (EIFW) and Bowden Institution, in Edmonton, Alberta on an as-and-when-requested basis.

### Contract Requirements
* The bidder is required to supply, deliver, and offload Miscellaneous Groceries, as and when requested, to the Edmonton Institute for Women (EIFW) and Bowden Institution, in Edmonton, Alberta.
* The contract period will be for three years, from April 1, 2022, to March 31, 2025.
* The procurement method is Competitive – Open Bidding.
* The selection criteria are Lowest Price.

### Key Contact Information
* Contracting Authority: PWGSC, Western Region
* End User Entity: Correctional Service Canada (CSC)
* Contact Person: Jill Aquino, PWGSC
* Contact Email: [jill.aquino@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jill.aquino@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Online Tender Notice
The tender notice can be viewed on the Ariba Discovery platform at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18700421?extsite=MTg3MDA0MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. 

Please make sure to proofread this entry carefully before accepting. Advice in the Comments would be highly appreciated.
